ns:common.topic.description: Lapis is an object-oriented stack-based computer language whose interpreter, in its current form, is about 50 kilobytes in size. Lapis is currently incorporated inside the tiny Scrinchy webserver.\nLapis was preceded by Sy, a stack-based computer language that was interpreted inside the Scrinchy 0.11 webserver.
rdfs:label: Lapis

ns:common.document.text: Lapis is an object-oriented stack-based computer language whose interpreter, in its current form, is about 50 kilobytes in size. Lapis is currently incorporated inside the tiny Scrinchy webserver.\nLapis was preceded by Sy, a stack-based computer language that was interpreted inside the Scrinchy 0.11 webserver.
